dmca.title: Fraudulent website - charleswinters.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Design By Joyce [mailto:joyce@designbyjoyce.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 5:41 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Fraudulent website - charleswinters.com
Subject: Fraudulent website - charleswinters.com


One of your customers, Charles T. Winters of www.charleswinters.com, has
plagiarized my website located at www.designbyjoyce.com (including my
client list, testimonials, resume, graphics and layout from one version
previous and more) claiming it as his own. In some cases he has simply
changed my name to his or inserted his image with very minimal changes.
Many of the pages are verbatim and have not changed at all, other than
his header graphic. A run of a link checker such as Xenu will even turn
up my email address (joyce@designbyjoyce.com). 
 
This man has half of my projects on his portfolio page and the rest are
screenshots of sites that he has simply harvested from the web. There
may be 2 legitimate ones there for sites he runs. I have contacted the
web designers for Autobabes.com.au, Healing Angel Card Readings,
search-engine-performance.com and they have all said they have never
heard of this person. I highly doubt he designed the site for Sports
Authority, Giant Foods or Clothier and Head and they have all been
notified as well. He is using my testimonials and portfolio graphics to
try to obtain web design projects.
 
This came to my attentiion because Haroo and Haroo of Dallas, TX saw his
posting on craigslist and was considering using him. They contacted me
for a reference since Charles Winters claimed to have designed my site.
Why a web designer would hire another web designer to develop their site
is beyond me.
 
It appears that he has his own server and there are 15 domain names on
that server as of today. Most of them all redirect to charleswinters.com
and others have no content. One has questionable content however,
depending on your guidelines, and that would be
www.spearmintrhinoescorts.com. 
 
I would hope that at a minimum your company would serve Charles Winters
with a warning as to his very questionable practices and plagiarism. I
plan to follow up with Google in reporting him in violation of the
Digital Millenium Copyright Act. I'd appreciate any assistance you can
provide in this matter.
 
Thank you,
Joyce Himes
Glendale, Arizona
www.designbyjoyce.com
